author: cnbc.com
title: Cisco Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif., May 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cisco (NASDAQ:CSCO) announced that earlier today its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.33 per common share to be paid on July 25, 2018 to all shareholders of record as of the close of business on July 6, 2018.
Ciscoâ€™s previous quarterly dividend of $0.33 per common share was paid on April 25, 2018. Future dividends will be subject to Board approval.
About Cisco
Cisco (NASDAQ:CSCO) is the worldwide technology leader that has been making the Internet work since 1984. Our people, products, and partners help society securely connect and seize tomorrow's digital opportunity today. Discover more at newsroom.cisco.com and follow us on Twitter at @Cisco.
